page.title: 09ANNUAL SPONSORED WALK
page.content: { Every May in Gainford there is a {sponsored walk,}which raises money for the children's sports day.Children ask members of their family or friends to sponsor them. There is a seven mile or eleven mile walk to complete. On the way there are checkpoints and refreshments for you to take advantage of. All the sponsorship money is used for funding the{village sports day. On sports day there are fancy dress competitions. 1st prize is Â£1, 2nd is 75 pence and 3rd is 50 pence. Also there are lots of different races, such as the obstacle race, the egg and spoon race and the sack race. The prizes are the same as for the fancy dress competitions. An excellent day is had by all, making it an enjoyable{annual village event.
